value.title: Learn Starcraft - Protoss Beginner Guide #1 (Updated Patch 4.0 FREE TO PLAY)
value.excerpt: How to command the incredibly strong forces of the protoss and cover weaknesses against the other inferior races. Updated for patch 4.0! This guide is not intended for COMPLETELY new players, but those who have played several games/campaign missions and grasp the very basics.

value.title: Learn to play Starcraft - Basic Guide for ALL RACES (updated 2017)
value.excerpt: A live guide to Starcraft 2: Legacy of the Void - Covering the basics and build orders for all of the races, and covering the important decisions to be made early in the game.  Not a step by step guide but a demonstration once you have the very basics of the units and races!

value.title: Learn to play Starcraft - Terran Beginner Guide #1 - Updated (2017 LOTV)
value.excerpt: A new and hopefully improved version of my guides for each race where I go over as many basics as possible while doing it live :)  I strongly believe that a super structured guide style is not very helpful compared to watching/playing the game actively.  Feedback is greatly appreciated. -- Watch live
